00046 Instruction::~Instruction()

00049 double Instruction::loop_over_mesh( ParallelMesh* mesh, 
00050                                     MeshDomain* domain, 
00051                                     const Settings* settings,
00052                                     MsqError& err )
00053 {
00054   return loop_over_mesh((Mesh*)mesh, domain, settings, err);

00056 
00057 void Instruction::initialize_vertex_byte( Mesh* mesh,
00058                                           MeshDomain* domain,
00059                                           const Settings* settings,
00060                                           MsqError& err )
00061 {
00062   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> verts;
00063   std::vector<unsigned char> bytes;
00064 
00065     // Handle SLAVE_ALL first because we want to work with vertices
00066     // in element connectivity lists rather than one big array of
00067     // vertex handles. 
00068   bool use_existing_slaved_flag = false;
00069   if (!settings || settings->get_slaved_ho_node_mode() == Settings::SLAVE_ALL) {
00070     std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> elems;
00071     std::vector<size_t> junk;
00072     mesh->get_all_elements( elems, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00073     for (size_t i = 0; i < elems.size(); ++i) {
00074       EntityTopology type;
00075       mesh->elements_get_topologies( &elems[i], &type, 1, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00076       unsigned ncorner = TopologyInfo::corners( type );
00077       
00078       verts.clear();
00079       junk.clear();
00080       mesh->elements_get_attached_vertices( &elems[i], 1, verts, junk, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00081       if (ncorner < verts.size())
00082         use_existing_slaved_flag = true;
00083       
00084       bytes.clear();
00085       bytes.resize( verts.size(), 0 );
00086       std::fill( bytes.begin() + TopologyInfo::corners(type), bytes.end(), MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT );
00087       mesh->vertices_set_byte( arrptr(verts), arrptr(bytes), verts.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00088     }
00089   }
00090   else if (settings && settings->get_slaved_ho_node_mode() == Settings::SLAVE_CALCULATED)
00091     use_existing_slaved_flag = true;
00092 
00093   std::vector<bool> flags;
00094   verts.clear();
00095   mesh->get_all_vertices( verts, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00096   bytes.clear();
00097   bytes.resize( verts.size(), 0 );  
00098   
00099     // Normally we start out with all bits cleared.  However, if
00100     // we're doing SLAVE_CALCULATED mode then we need to perserve
00101     // the exinsting value of that bit because it was presumably
00102     // set by a previous tool in the InstructionQueue.  Also, if doing
00103     // SLAVE_ALL, preserve the value we just set.
00104   if (use_existing_slaved_flag) {
00105     mesh->vertices_get_byte( arrptr(verts), arrptr(bytes), verts.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00106     for (size_t i = 0; i < bytes.size(); ++i)
00107       bytes[i] &= (unsigned char)MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT;
00108   }
00109     // If getting slaved flag for higher-order nodes from application,
00110     // copy it into vertex byte now.
00111   else if (settings && settings->get_slaved_ho_node_mode() == Settings::SLAVE_FLAG) {
00112     mesh->vertices_get_slaved_flag( arrptr(verts), flags, verts.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00113     for (size_t i = 0; i < bytes.size(); ++i)
00114       if (flags[i])
00115         bytes[i] |= (unsigned char)MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT;
00116   }
00117 
00118     // If using application-specified fixed flag, copy that into
00119     // vertex byte now.
00120   if (!settings || settings->get_fixed_vertex_mode() == Settings::FIXED_FLAG) {
00121     mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( arrptr(verts), flags, verts.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00122     for (size_t i = 0; i < bytes.size(); ++i)
00123       if (flags[i])
00124         bytes[i] |= (unsigned char)MsqVertex::MSQ_HARD_FIXED;
00125   }
00126     // otherwise need to mark vertices as fixed based on geometric domain
00127   else {
00128     if (!domain) {
00129       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Request to fix vertices by domain classification "
00130                       "requres a domain.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
00131       return;
00132     }
00133     const unsigned short dim = settings->get_fixed_vertex_mode();
00134     assert(dim < 4u);
00135     std::vector<unsigned short> dof( verts.size() );
00136     domain->domain_DoF( arrptr(verts), arrptr(dof), verts.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00137     for (size_t i = 0; i < bytes.size(); ++i)
00138       if (dof[i] <= dim)
00139         bytes[i] |= (unsigned char)MsqVertex::MSQ_HARD_FIXED;
00140   }
00141   
00142     // Copy flag values back to mesh instance
00143   mesh->vertices_set_byte( arrptr(verts), arrptr(bytes), verts.size(), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00144 }
